sections.heading: Certificate
sections.text: required to be filed with and recorded by Secretary of State; contents; fees.

sections.heading: Construction,
sections.text: operation and maintenance of lines over public and private lands.

sections.heading: Right-of-way
sections.text: for line: Procedure for appraisal and compensation for private land; appeal.

sections.heading: Public
sections.text:
utility furnishing telephone service required to assist peace officers in

tracing certain callers; immunity for good faith reliance; limitations

concerning wiretapping.

sections.heading: Public
sections.text:
utility furnishing telephone service and other providers required to disconnect

telephone number pursuant to court order or order of Public Utilities

Commission of Nevada; such providers prohibited from forwarding calls or

providing recorded message with new number for disconnected telephone number.

sections.heading: Provider
sections.text:
of cellular or other portable service required to provide access at no charge

to telephone number to be used in emergency.

sections.heading: State
sections.text:
and local entities prohibited from regulating use of certain telephonic devices

by persons operating motor vehicles.

sections.heading: Eligible
sections.text:
provider, independent administrator or National Lifeline Eligibility Verifier

authorized to access certain databases to determine or verify status of

eligible customers.

sections.heading: Reduction
sections.text:
in telephone rates provided by lifeline or tribal link up services: Methods for

determining; applicability; reimbursement.

sections.heading: Enhanced
sections.text:
911 service: Immunity from liability for certain entities providing service

through public safety answering point in certain circumstances.

sections.heading: Procedures
sections.text:
and standards for review and approval of application to construct facility; requirements

following denial of application; limitations on power of land use authority.

sections.heading: Assessment
sections.text: of costs incurred to process application.

sections.heading: Written
sections.text:
decision required upon denial of application; contents of decision; filing of

decision and record with court upon bringing action against land use authority.

sections.heading: Provider
sections.text:
of wireless telecommunications required to provide call location information to

law enforcement in certain circumstances; establishment of protocols for

voluntary disclosure of such information allowed; immunity for good faith

action.

sections.heading: Provider
sections.text:
of wireless telecommunications required to submit emergency contact information

to Department to facilitate requests from law enforcement for call location

information.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for interception, interruption or delay of message sent over telephone line.

sections.heading: Penalty
sections.text: for damaging or interfering with use of telephone line.
